channel.title: Ankush Patel
channel.description: Ankush Patel is a proficient ML engineer, dedicated to crafting scalable and engaging machine learning applications. With a robust academic foundation and extensive professional experience, he possesses strong programming skills, adept team collaboration abilities, and entrepreneurial acumen.

item.title: Deriving the OLS Estimator
item.description: How to derive the OLS Estimator with matrix notation and a tour of math typesetting using markdown with the help of KaTeX.
item.author: ap@ankushp.com (Ankush Patel)
